title: Challenging Negative Thoughts
content: Techniques to question and reframe negative thoughts, fostering a positive mindset.

title: Coping Skills for Depression
content: Effective coping mechanisms to manage symptoms and improve daily life with depression.

title: De-Catastrophizing
content: Methods to reduce catastrophic thinking, promoting a more balanced perspective.

title: Goal Breakdown
content: Breaking down long-term goals into manageable steps for progress in depression management.

title: Goal Exploration
content: Discovering and setting meaningful goals aligned with managing depression effectively.

title: Gratitude Exercises
content: Practices that cultivate gratitude, aiding in alleviating depressive symptoms.

title: Gratitude Journaling
content: Creating a journal to document daily gratitude, enhancing mental well-being.

title: Letter to My Past Self
content: Writing a compassionate letter to oneself, acknowledging growth and resilience.

title: Self Care Assessment
content: Assessing and developing a personalized self-care plan for managing depression.

title: Self Esteem Journal
content: Techniques and prompts to boost self-esteem and confidence in depression management.

title: Sleep Diary
content: Tracking sleep patterns and habits to improve sleep quality in depression.

title: Thought Log
content: Recording thoughts and emotions to identify patterns and manage depressive symptoms.

title: Mindfulness Exercises
content: Practical mindfulness exercises to cultivate awareness and reduce stress in daily life.

title: Life Story
content: Exploring one's life journey and experiences as a therapeutic method for mental health.

title: My Strengths and Weaknesses
content: Self-reflection on personal strengths and weaknesses for self-awareness and growth.
